Hi there! Ready to plan your trip to Paris, London, or Tokyo?

patterns: What can I see in Paris
responses:
Here are some must-see landmarks in Paris:
* Eiffel Tower - Visit at sunset for the best views
* Notre-Dame Cathedral - Historic Gothic masterpiece
* Louvre Museum - Home to the Mona Lisa

Check out these Paris highlights:
* Arc de Triomphe - Iconic monument with city views
* Sacré-Cœur - Beautiful basilica in Montmartre
* Palace of Versailles - Royal château and gardens

Don't miss these Paris attractions:
* Musée d'Orsay - Impressionist art in former train station
* Seine River - Take a scenic river cruise
* Luxembourg Gardens - Perfect for a peaceful break

Essential Paris food experiences:
* Fresh croissants from local boulangeries
* Classic beef bourguignon in bistros
* French cheese and wine tasting

Try these Paris culinary delights:
* Traditional coq au vin
* Fresh baguettes and pastries
* Authentic French crêpes

Must-try Paris foods:
* French onion soup
* Escargots in garlic butter
* Macarons from patisseries

Paris weather overview:
* Spring (March-May): Mild 8-19°C, perfect for sightseeing
* Summer (June-August): Warm 15-25°C, busy season
* Fall (September-November): Cool 11-21°C, fewer tourists

Best times to visit Paris:
* Spring for blooming gardens and mild weather
* Fall for fewer crowds and pleasant temperatures
* Winter for festive atmosphere and shorter lines

Paris seasonal highlights:
* April-May for perfect walking weather
* September-October for harvest season and wine
* December for holiday decorations and markets

patterns: What can I see in London
responses:
Top London landmarks to visit:
* Big Ben and Houses of Parliament
* Tower of London - Home to Crown Jewels
* Buckingham Palace - Royal residence

Must-see London attractions:
* Westminster Abbey - Historic coronation site
* Tower Bridge - Iconic river crossing
* British Museum - World treasures

Popular London sites:
* London Eye - Best city views
* St. Paul's Cathedral - Stunning architecture
* Hyde Park - Royal gardens

Classic London food experiences:
* Fish and chips at local shops
* Traditional afternoon tea
* Sunday roast at historic pubs

Try these London favorites:
* Full English breakfast
* Curry on Brick Lane
* Borough Market food stalls

London food highlights:
* Traditional meat pies
* Fresh oysters at seafood bars
* Street food at Camden Market

London weather highlights:
* Spring (March-May): Mild 8-15°C with blooming parks
* Summer (June-August): Pleasant 18-23°C, peak season
* Fall (September-November): Cool 11-17°C, beautiful colors

Best times for London:
* May-June for warm days and less rain
* September for cultural events and good weather
* December for festive celebrations

London weather tips:
* Pack a light raincoat - weather changes quickly
* Visit indoor attractions in winter months
* Summer has longest daylight hours

patterns: What can I see in Tokyo
responses:
Essential Tokyo landmarks:
* Sensō-ji Temple - Oldest Buddhist temple
* Tokyo Skytree - Amazing city views
* Meiji Shrine - Peaceful forest setting

Popular Tokyo spots:
* Shibuya Crossing - World's busiest crossing
* Imperial Palace - Emperor's residence
* Ueno Park - Museums and gardens

Must-visit Tokyo areas:
* Akihabara - Electronics and anime
* Harajuku - Fashion and culture
* Tsukiji Outer Market - Famous fish market

Must-try Tokyo foods:
* Fresh sushi at Tsukiji Market
* Ramen from local shops
* Yakitori at izakayas

Tokyo food experiences:
* Traditional tempura
* Udon noodle bowls
* Japanese street food

Popular Tokyo dishes:
* Authentic tonkatsu
* Fresh sashimi
* Matcha desserts

Tokyo seasonal guide:
* Spring (March-May): Mild 10-19°C, cherry blossoms
* Fall (September-November): Pleasant 12-23°C, autumn colors
* Winter (December-February): Cool 2-12°C, clear skies

Best times for Tokyo:
* Late March for cherry blossom season
* October-November for comfortable temperatures
* January-February for fewer tourists

Tokyo weather tips:
* Avoid rainy season (June-July)
* Spring and fall are most comfortable
* Summer can be very humid

Transportation tips:
* Get a multi-day transit pass
* Download local transport apps
* Use metro for speed and efficiency

Getting around advice:
* Take buses for scenic routes
* Walk in city centers
* Use taxis late at night

Daily budget guidelines:
* Budget: $70-100 (hostels, street food)
* Mid-range: $150-200 (hotels, restaurants)
* Luxury: $300+ (high-end accommodations)

Money-saving tips:
* Book accommodations early
* Use public transportation
* Get city attraction passes
